c74object.name: ta.pattrlist
c74object.description: Allows you to bound to several pattr objects, where you can get/set values through lists. This abstractions is a wrapper for ta_polypattr. See ta_polypattr.maxhelp for complementary information, or to design slightly different list features for pattr objects.

outlet.digest: all pattr values in a single list

objarg.name: voices
objarg.description: The argument is called "voice" since ta.pattrlist allocates each bound pattr inside a poly~ voice.

method.name: input
method.digest: Accepts same messages as poly~ and pattr
method.description: Send messages to ta.pattrlist as if you're sending messages to a pattr object inside poly~ (for ex: "target 1, bindto obj_varname" would make the pattr object in voice#1 bind to an object named "obj_varname")

attribute.name: bindto
attribute.description: The scripting name order in the input list will be maintained in the output values list

attribute.name: marker
attribute.description: The word marker, followed by a 1 or a 0, defines what kind of scripting names to expect, either regular or pattrmarker-like. If the marker attribute is set to 1, ta.pattrlist will expect scripting names like ::mymarker::obj_name. And, if the marker attribute is set to 0, ta.pattrlist will expect "regular" scripting names like mypathcer::obj_name.

entry.name: anything
entry.description:
Out left outlet: list containing the voice number (int) and the value of the corresponding pattr.
Out right outlet: list containing all pattr values, where the order of the values correspond to the order of the bindto attribute/message list.
